name: The 1991 World Cup Knockout
overview: A text based cycle racing management simulator created by Eddie Thewlis and published by ET Software in 1991. Choose your country from the top dozen cycling medalists. Based on your team pick your riders from popular cyclists of the times. Get your match ups with the other team you are riding against and if this is a home or away race and watch the match ups. Based on this determine who to rest for the next race. If all goes well you could end up at the World Regions Cup!
